403.message: The email or password you entered is incorrect.

actionPopupsAfterAWhileToolTip.message: Popup notifications will close automatically after X time

addedTimedEventInThePast.message: The time of this event has already passed! Would you like me to change it to the same time tomorrow?

allowThisExtensionToReadYourFacebookEven.message: Allow this extension to read your Facebook event?

alsoExtraFeaturesForGmail.message: Donate once and also unlock the extra features of my $1

backgroundOfNotificationTooltip.message: Sets the background color of notification popup

calendarViewAgendaTitle.message: When clicking on the calendar icon this will show you a small calendar with the events below in an agenda format

calendarViewRegularTitle.message: When clicking on the calendar icon this will show you a calendar with the events marked within the calendar

canceledInAppPurchase.message: Try PayPal instead? or contact me for questions at

cannotUpdateEventsInThePast.message: Problem occured! I currently cannot update events that happened in the past, I can update events today or in the immediate future. You can use the Google Calendar webpage for past events!

changeThisDomain.message: To change this email domain now $1

changeThisDomain2.message: sign out and sign in as a different user

changingIcon.message: Change button icon or display today's date

continueWithoutFeatures.message: Continue using this extension with lots of options but without these extra features.

copyPrivateAddress.message: Copy the Private Address (XML) of a calendar to the clipboard.

copyPrivateAddressTitle.message: In your Google Calendar page on the left is your calendar list, click on the down-arrow button next to the calendar of your choice, then select Calendar settings. Beside 'Private Address' select XML and copy the address to the clipboard. Note: If you can't find the 'Private Address' then at the domain admin-level you must change service-settings of the calendar

createDeleteEvents.message: Create or delete events by clicking in the calendar

creditCardOrPaypal.message: You can use your credit card or PayPal to

customizeCalendar.message: Change the height, width, visible calendars, colors, etc.

customizeCalendarTitle.message: In the popup calendar click the options button then 'Customize'

daysRemaining.message: Show days remaining instead of time of event

daysRemainingToolTip.message: If the event is days away, then show the days left ex. 2d

description.message: See your next events, get meeting desktop notifications, add or snooze events from the popup with opening the Google Calendar page!

developingMore.message: and I'm working on more of your suggestions...

doNotNotifyMeOfUpdates.message: Do not notify me of updates

doNotShowNotificationsForAlldayEvents.message: Do not show notifications for all day events

doNotShowNotificationsForAlldayEventsTit.message: Do not show notifications for all day events

doNotShowNotificationsForRepeatingEvents.message: Do not show notifications for repeating events

doNotShowNotificationsWhenBrowserClosed.message: Do not show notifications when browser window is closed

doNotShowNotificationsWhenBrowserClosedT.message: Your Chrome browser will still run in the background with a tray in the icon, BUT, the notifications will NOT be shown!

doNotShowPastNotifications.message: Do not show notifications for events in the past

doNotShowPastNotificationsTitle.message: Use this only if you are absolutely getting your reminders from a 2nd device/computer so that when you open your browser or resume from standby you will not receive past notifications. If you check this option and that is not the case then <u>you might miss reminders!</u>

drawAttentionToBrowser.message: Blink Chrome in the taskbar on Windows or bounce the Chrome icon on a Mac (Beta)

drawAttentionToBrowserTooltip.message: This will happen only if the focus is not on the browser. Useful if using multiple workspaces... in Windows: Blinks Chrome application in the taskbar. On Mac: Bounces the Chrome icon

enableLanguageDetectionToolTip.message: Speak in the language of your reminder by using this language detection service!

enablePrivateAddressTitle.message: Go to calendar service settings section in the control panels, then select 'Share all information, and outsiders can change calendars' option

errorAddingEvent.message: Error adding event! Possibly due to no internet connection!

errorGettingCalendar.message: Problem getting calendar, check the URL and try again! (Error: $1)

errorGettingCalendarUnauthorized.message: Unauthorized! You must first sign in to your Google Apps Calendar by opening a new tab

eventColors.message: Use event colors (new look only)

eventColorsToolTip.message: When you override the event colors within Google Calendar they will be reflected in this extension

excludeCalendarFromTitle.message: Click options button to hide specific calendars from your calendar/agenda view or click 'checking' to exclude events from the button icon and notifications from specific calendars

excludeCalendarsCheckboxChecking.message: Please click the link on the right in this option

excludeCalendarsNote.message: (Applies to 'old' look only! New look uses selected calendars from webpage)

excludeHiddenCalendarsFromButton.message: Exclude hidden calendars from button icon

excludeHiddenCalendarsFromButtonToolTip.message: Do NOT show events from calendars which are NOT selected/shown in your Google Calendar webpage, in other words sync the visible calendars/events with what you see in your Google Calendar page

excludeRecurringEventsButtonIcon.message: Exclude repeating events from button icon

excludeRecurringEventsButtonIconTooltip.message: Any events set to be repeated will not show up in the button icon

extraFeaturesClicked.message: You tried using one of these extra features...

failureWithInAppPurchase.message: Failure with transaction! Try PayPal instead?

failureWithPayPalPurchase.message: Canceled or failure with transaction! Try Google Wallet instead?

forSuggestions.message: for suggestions or find out more

googleAppsCalendarsForce.message: Force Google's multiple sign-in to always default to your Google Apps Calendars

googleAppsCalendarsTitle.message: Only check this if you have and want to use your Google Apps for Businesses or Education Calendar. Note, this will disable the regular Google Calendar checking!

googleAppsNote.message: This will disable the regular Google Calendar checking

helpMeTranslate.message: Can you help me with the translations? $1 the correct ones!

helpSupport.message: to help support the author of this extension!

highlightCurrentDayTooltip.message: When you see the calendar in month view the current day will briefly pulsate

highlightDateAndTimes.message: Underline dates and times in Gmail for quick event creation (Optimized for English only)

highlightDateAndTimesToolTip.message: Detect a date or time in a Gmail email and creates a link for a new event in your Google Calendar with the date and time already set.

highlightDateAndTimesWarning.message: You must reload any existing Gmail tabs for this to take effect

highlightWeekendsTitle.message: Lightly shades the weekend days, but, only in 'Regular' month calendar view

hoursRemaining.message: Show hours remaining instead of time of event

hoursRemainingTitle.message: If the event is further in the day and less than 24 hours away, then the hours left will be shown ex. 4h

htmlNotificationToolTip.message: Has multiple snooze durations, snooze all and dismiss all buttons

iconTooltip.message: The icon to use for the popup button

keepHoveringOverTheBluePlusOne.message: Keep hovering on the blue +1 until the text appears then click it to share on Google+

languageToolTip.message: Changes the display and voice notification language. Note: You might see many languages at once because these are the rules: It will display what I've translated in the language you choose here, if I haven't translated some words it will look for it in the language of your browser, if I haven't translated those it will display it in English. Note: To change the calendar language inside the popup use Google Calendar's settings.

licenseOnlyValidFor.message: The license will only be valid for users who sign into their Google Calendar with a

maxDaysAhead.message: Number of days to look ahead

maxDaysAheadTitle.message: Maximum number of days for showing a countdown on the icon

missingOptions.message: Are you missing options? Are the translations bad? Contact

multipleUserLicense.message: Get a multiple user license for your organisation

mustAddCalendar.message: If you enable Google Apps you must add a calendar!

mustClickShareLinks.message: Use any share link below the popup calendar once and then you can remove them all here!

mustSignInToPay.message: You must sign in to your Google Calendar and wait for this extension to load!

noPermissionOnEvent.message: Problem moving this event, you might not have permission!

notTaxExempt.message: I am not a tax-exempt organization

notificationFontSizeTooltip.message: Sets the font size of the event title in the popup notification. Set the smallest for when there is a long event title and set the largest for when there is a short event title

notificationSoundTitle.message: Plays a sound if you enable notifications above when your events occur

notificationTextToSpeechTitle.message: The title of your event will be spoken out loud using text to speech, great when your computer is in the next room!

notificationZoomTooltip.message: Use this to shrink the 'all' the text in the notification window (useful for those with high DPI scaling)

offlineModeTitle.message: Get notified of events without an internet connection! Warning: Your events will be saved on this computer!

onlyPopupsForOwner.message: Only show notifications for events from calendars I own

onlyPopupsForOwnerTooltip.message: Notifications will only show events from calendars that you are the owner. This generally means the calendars under 'My calendars' and not from calendars that are shared or from the 'Other calendars' section

onlyRemoveAfterDonation.message: You can only remove the donation link after making a donation!

pastDaysTitle.message: Gray out the past days of the calendar, but, only in 'Regular' month calendar view

pastePrivateAddress.message: Paste the Private Address (XML) of the calendar here

pendingNotificationsIntervalToolTip.message: If you have not take any action on your pending reminders, then a reminder will animate at this interval in the toolbar. Note: Only the first reminder will play a sound notification (if enabled above)

pollingIntervalTooltip.message: The interval in which to fetch events from your Google Calendar and to update the button

popupGoogleCalendarWebsite.message: Make button open Google Calendar website instead of popup

popupGoogleCalendarWebsiteHelpTitle.message: When clicking on the button icon open Google Calendar website instead of small popup window. (Holding CTRL when clicking on the icon will also do this!)

problemCommunicatingTryAgain.message: Error: $1 Problem communicating with $2, please try again!

problemSigningIn.message: Problem signing in! Possibly due to no internet connection!

rateTitle.message: Speed of speech: words per minute

recentlyAddedEvent.message: Problem occured! If you recently added this event via the webpage then click the refresh icon or else please use the Google Calendar webpage!

reducedDonationAd_notification.message: Good news long time user! Extras are only $1 click to see/hide this.

reducedDonationAd_popup.message: Good news long time user! You can get the latest $1 for only 50¢

rememberQuickAddTitle.message: Note: This will only save the Google AuthKey but NOT your sign in credentials

remindersBeforeEvent.message: Only show notifications for events with a

remindersBeforeEventHelpTitle.message: In your Google Calendar page on the left is your calendar list, click on the down-arrow button next to the calendar of your choice, then select 'Notifications'. Then add the 'Pop-up' reminder and set a reminder time. Note: You can also override this option for each event when adding or editing them

removeDonationLinkTitle.message: This will remove the Donate link under the calendar

repeatSoundTooltip.message: Repeats the notification or voice sound if the notification popup window has not been dismissed

richNotificationToolTip.message: Actionable popups, but not obtrusive since they'll disappear in a few seconds on their own if no action is taken. Think of them like notifications on your smartphone. They provide relevant, real-time information but you can choose to ignore any further action until later.

runInBackground.message: Run in background when Google Chrome is closed

runInBackgroundToolTip.message: Continue receiving notifications even while your browser is closed! I recommend this only for advanced users.

runInBackgroundWarning2.message: If you disabled background apps in Chrome you can re-enable them by reading the $1

runInBackgroundWarning3.message: You might have to use the $1 from the Gmail login page

selectCalendar.message: First you must select a calendar!

shareIntro.message: Try out this awesome Chrome extension

showAgendaOptions.message: Show options link in agenda view

showAgendaOptionsTitle.message: Show options link in agenda view

showButtonTooltip.message: Show tooltip when hovering over the button icon

showButtonTooltipTooltip.message: Show the next events when hovering over the button icon

showConsoleMessagesTitle.message: Meant for debugging only and may slow down the extension a little bit!

showContextMenuItem.message: Show context menu item on right click

showContextMenuItemTooltip.message: Adds a menu item when you right click in any webpage or email webpage to quickly add it to your calendar

showDayOnBadge.message: Show current day of week on button icon

showDayOnBadgeExceptWhenDaysLeft.message: Except when next event is days away

showDayOnBadgeExceptWhenHoursLeft.message: Except when next event is hours away

showDayOnBadgeExceptWhenMinutesLeft.message: Except when next event is minutes away

showDayOnBadgeTooltip.message: Instead of countdown to the next event display the current day of the week like 'Tue' etc. Note: You can also list exceptions!

showDesktopNotificationsTitle.message: Enable this to show a notification when an event in your calendar occurs

showEventTimeOnBadge.message: Show time of event on button icon

showEventTimeOnBadgeTooltip.message: Display the time till the next event on top of the icon

showHeader.message: Show the top header in the popup window

showHeaderTooltip.message: Displays the Quick Add and other commands at the top part of the popup

showMinutesLeftInBadge.message: Show minutes remaining instead of time of event

showMinutesLeftInBadgeTitle.message: If the event is coming soon then show the minutes remaining

showQuickAddTooltip.message: Displays the quick add text input area at the top left

showTimeSpecificEventsBeforeAllDay.message: Show time specific events before all day events

showTimeSpecificEventsBeforeAllDayToolti.message: If tomorrow you have an all day event and a 10am event it will show 10am instead of 1d

showViewDropDownTooltip.message: Displays the 'View' dropdown list (Note: You need to see this to change your view initially, afterwards you can hide it :)

signInAsUserOfOrg.message: You must $1 with your organisation's email

signInAsUserOfOrg2.message: sign out and sign in to your calendar

sslTitle.message: Always use SSL encryption when accessing Google Calendar

standardNotificationToolTip.message: With action buttons like snooze etc.

supportAndRequestsPrioritized.message: to support me and get your requests prioritized!

textNotificationToolTip.message: No action buttons like snooze etc. Compatible with OS X Notification Center and Growl

thankYouForYourContribution.message: The features are now unlocked. Thank you for your contribution!

timeoutNote.message: Change it only if you have lots of calendars or events

timeoutTooltip.message: May eliminate sign in problem, increase it only if you have 10 or more calendars or if you have lots of events)

timeoutTryAgain.message: Timeout occured when communicating with $1, please try again!

unlockFeatures.message: Unlock these features and future ones with a one time donation of any amount and they will be immediately available!

unlockHeader.message: Get the extra features and support your developer

voiceNotificationOnlyIfIdle.message: Only if you're away from computer for at least

voiceNotificationOnlyIfIdleTooltip.message: Use this option if you ONLY want to hear the voice when you're not using the computer or it is idling

whyContributeReason1.message: I put many hours updating and supporting $1 weekly in response to your suggestions

whyContributeReason2.message: I read and provide quick feedback to your comments and reviews
